title: Restaurant Reservation
description: Full stack application designed to assist in managing reservations and seating those reservations to tables.
techStack: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node.JS, Express, PostgreSQL, Knex, Git.

title: Movie Madness
description: Full stack application working with an already existing tv show API. Displays, suggests, and filters tv shows, with the ability to create a playlist/watchlist for later.
techStack: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node.JS, Express, PostgreSQL, Knex, Git.

title: Recipe Tracker
description: Front End application for saving food recipes.
